org.clusternet.ftp

Class ProtocolcFTP

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.clusternet.ftp.ProtocolcFTP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ClusterNetConnectionListener, ClusterNetGroupListener, ClusterNetMemberInputStreamListener, ClusterNetMemberListener, ClusterNetRxDataListener

    public class ProtocolcFTP
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ClusterNetRxDataListener, ClusterNetMemberInputStreamListener, ClusterNetConnectionListener, ClusterNetGroupListener, ClusterNetMemberListener
    Protocolo FTP Multicast versión 1.0
